resources.string: Assalamualaikum warahmatullahi Wabaraktuh All praise is to Allah. We praise asking for help, and begging for forgiveness to him. no God has the right to be worshiped properly except Him, and Muhammad صَلَّى اللهُ عَلَيْهِ وَسَلَّمَ ، Is a servant and Messenger - his Application to Facilitate the user to be able to read the Morning and Evening Remembrances and in the Application there is not only the Morning and Evening Remembrances but there is also a Prayer Daily and Dhikr After the Fardhu Prayer
